name: CBSSTDSexualHistoryDrugUseQuestionnaireVS
title: STD Sexual History and Drug Use Questionnaire Panel
description: This is an example valueset for how to setup coding for an Epi Questionnaire Panel using a selection of codes from the STD MMG.

concept.display: Had Sex with a Male within the Past 12 Months
Had Sex with a Female within the Past 12 Months
Had Sex with an Anonymous Partner within the Past 12 Months
Had Sex with a Person Known to Him/Her to be an "Intravenous Drug User (IDU)" within the Past 12 Months
Had Sex while Intoxicated and/or High on Drugs within the Past 12 Months
Exchanged Drugs/Money for Sex within the Past 12 Months
Had Sex with a Person Who is Known to Her to Be an MSM within Past 12 Months
Engaged in Injection Drug use Within Past 12 Months
